name: @pictues/gemini
description: Accesses to all sorts of Google Gemini image-related features.

scripts.chrome-extension:build: npm --prefix chrome-extension run package && mkdirp -p dist && shx mv chrome-extension/*.tgz dist && cd dist && tar2zip picteus-chrome-extension-0.1.0.tgz && shx rm -rf *.tgz
scripts.build: npm run chrome-extension:prerequisites && npm run chrome-extension:build && npm run self:build
